results.title: Metformin Enhances Autophagy and Provides Cardioprotection in delta-Sarcoglycan Deficiency-Induced Dilated Cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: Thirty-two-week-old @DISEASE_Limb_girdle_muscular_dystrophy_type_2C @DISEASE_MESH:C535900 @@@delta-sarcoglycan-deficient@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ exhibiting established @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D009202 @@@cardiomyopathy@@@ with extensive left @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Right_Ventricular_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566255 @@@ventricular dilatation and dysfunction@@@ were administered saline or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (200 mg/kg per day) for 4 weeks using osmotic mini-pumps.

citations.NLM: Kanamori H, Naruse G, Yoshida A, Minatoguchi S, Watanabe T, Kawaguchi T, Yamada Y, Mikami A, Kawasaki M, Takemura G, Minatoguchi S. Metformin Enhances Autophagy and Provides Cardioprotection in delta-Sarcoglycan Deficiency-Induced Dilated Cardiomyopathy. Circ Heart Fail. 2019 Apr;12(4):e005418. PMID: 30922066
